title: Ep. 463 - The Inevitable Impeachment
description:
How did we get to this point where we can’t agree on anything? Some people are blaming Trump, some blame the IG report, some are blaming a weak Democratic field. The real root cause is far deeper. Can't get enough of The Michael Knowles Show? Enjoy ad-free shows, live discussions, and more by becoming an ALL ACCESS member TODAY at: https://dailywire.com/Knowles
